before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5nanm","text":"Make sure all materials and equipment needed for packaging are available and functional.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r6ni","text":"Ensure that any documents to accompany the product are also printed and included in the packaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3gigu","text":"After production and QC (internal and External) of our products, some documents are prepared which will accompany the reagent or products whenever they are sent to a user to ensure they are used correctly to avoid altered results. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27j00","text":"There include the Product Specification sheet which carries information on the reagent description, composition, use and storage. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":18,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":27}],"data":{}},{"key":"8n57c","text":"Another important document is the Certificate of Analysis with a list of all QC tests that have been performed on the reagent and the Datasheet which contains reagent features, application, protocol for use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":34,"length":23},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":134,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":23},{"key":2,"offset":134,"length":9}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"084F91BBED6611EC91E20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cfVKi9iD9ezmc0_EtnlGgeXODfYF3lhNyKr2qCESO2k/edit?usp=sharing"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"084F91FFED6611EC91E20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PLShpE01qPGD00juZr5v5u4zVgcv7ZwjfU7IwhGNI8A/edit?usp=sharing"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"084F922BED6611EC91E20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/document/d/1x34azNmkMsOoR7KSA691n15yN5FxZF7rmlO0tSLin9s/edit"}}}}

steps.section: Gather all the information about the order at hand or product to be packaged
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fp49o","text":"The information include:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1crtj","text":"Nature and quantity of products; Destination; Customers detail; Date and expected delivery date…). This information will guide on the type of packaging that will be required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5l9fd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"u0p9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7tajq","text":"In our case, we prepare product package when we are to send a product out for testing by an external lab or following an order from a consumer. Where products are to be retained or stored in the lab, they are stored in appropriate containers and location. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Print specific amounts and type of labels and stickers
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bhiuo","text":"Current equipment used to print sticker and label: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkfph","text":"Labelwriter 450 Turbo from Dymo","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":21}],"data":{}},{"key":"5uctp","text":"Dymo 54 mm*101mm 220 Label","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gdob","text":"SKU: ED1F-073WH Cryogenic Labels (0.7’’x1.49’’) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ej2k3","text":"SKU: 30252 LW Address Labels (1, 1/8\" x 3, 1/2\")","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f749j","text":"Once set Up and installed, use the Dymo label printer to print suitable products and customer information stickers( print the corresponding sticker with product name, date of manufacture, expiration date, storage condition etc.)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":5,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":5,"length":6}],"data":{}},{"key":"32ds2","text":"Pre-designed (Ready-made) versions of product labels and customer information labels can be made and Information on the design can be modified to fit new products.
